body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Russell Watson. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Russell, my name is Madison Lopez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in purchasing a car and had some questions about your financing options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Madison. Could I start by confirming your preferred contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three two one, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, thank you. And just to make sure we have the most up-to-date information, can you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's madison.lopez@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. I'll look into our current financing plans and get back to you shortly. Do you have any other questions in the meantime?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Russell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Madison. Thank you for choosing Vincenzo's Benzos. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Russell Watson and the customer's name is Madison Lopez.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
